Articles.Content:
Goes-H or Goes 7 was a spin-stabilized weather satellite. It was built by NOAA and was launched in 1987. Fun fact it was designed to work for 3-7 Years but worked for 25 years.

![ebpX2Ea.png](http://i.imgur.com/ebpX2Ea.png)

![bdiNqHD.png](http://i.imgur.com/bdiNqHD.png)

Download: [http://www./download/kc3lhvnw1ujkid6/GOES+H.craft](http://www./download/kc3lhvnw1ujkid6/GOES+H.craft)

Wow, Lime, that looks awesome!

I unfortunately can't give rep because of this.. 24-hour limit..
